short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents users from entering distracting websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever told yourself that you would work hard, but end up watching cat videos the entire day? Well look no further, with concentrate, you can stay on topic and never stray away from work again. My app will "block" distracting websites, and replace them with motivational pictures.

Features:
-Can easily toggle on and off
-Motivational pictures
-Prevents users from being distraction

What's next?
- Adding CSS to improve the look
- More motivation (possibly with enjoyable videos)
- Finish fixing and debugging the Option section for more access
